name: Ted and The Blades of Doom
name_original: Ted and The Blades of Doom
description:
Ted and the Blades of DOOM

Venture out as Ted the turtle looking for his best friend Bill. After hearing news of your friend lost in the sewer, you must head down fighting trash can lid throwing trash pandas and bears armed with chainsaws that bad pet parents flushed down the toilet because they couldn't handle them when they were grown. They seem to be controlled by some larger creature. Perhaps they know something about your best friend! Be careful because some weirdo booby trapped the whole place with launching sawblades... what a psychopath!

Ted and the Blades of DOOM is a roguelike game where your Leaves(currency) proceed through death to purchase upgrades and get stronger to complete the game. Goodluck and beware the naked mole rat!

IF YOU GET SPAWNED ON PRESS 'R' ... Sorry - Holtzzy

All Art - Cavedens

All Programming  - Holtzzy

Game Design - Cavedens/Holtzzy
